0871A46B.Toast: Kres is pained with the memories  of his past actions.

1315987A.Phase23Description: I should go to the pyre in Backwater. I can burn the remains there.

5CD6EA0D.Phase8Description: I found the shallow grave. I must dig up the remains, so that I may burn them at the Backwater pyre.

8784047D.Phase17Description: I've burned the remains, bringing the remains peace. I should return to Kres.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: Kres told me that there is a shallow grave near a tunnel of gnarled trees. I should look there.
